markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Preternatural Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2879) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2851)

**Trigger**
You're targeted by a Strike or a spell attack roll, or you're about to roll a saving throw against a spell effect.

**Requirements**
You have one or more hands free.

</column>

---

You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the triggering effect until the start of your next turn.
name: Preternatural Parry
requirement: You have one or more hands free.
requirement_markdown: You have one or more hands free.
